create_dm_yyyymm:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bi_st.st_active_user_retain_dm_yyyymm (
                                    `statis_date` int(9) NOT NULL,
                                    `hour` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '小时为-1，则统计的为天，小时存在具体到天的小时统计',
                                    `channel_id` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT 'AppStore、同步推、91助手 等，目前渠道为-1（未知）',
                                    `app_plat_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '安卓，IOS，PC，Web',
                                    `app_version_id` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '坐标应用的版本',
                                    `active_user_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
                                    `second_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
                                    `third_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
                                    `fourth_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
                                    `fifth_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
                                    `sixth_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
                                    `seventh_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
                                    `fifteenth_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
                                    `thirtieth_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
                                    INDEX `idx_st_active_user_retain_dm_yyyymm` (`statis_date`,`hour`,`channel_id`,`app_plat_id`,`app_version_id`)
                                ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create_ds_tmpuser_yyyymmdd:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bi_tmp.tmp_st_active_user_retain_ds_all_store (
								    `statis_date` int(9) NOT NULL,
								    `hour` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '小时为-1，则统计的为天，小时存在具体到天的小时统计',
								    `channel_id` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT 'AppStore、同步推、91助手 等，目前渠道为-1（未知）',
								    `app_plat_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '安卓，IOS，PC，Web',
								    `app_version_id` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '坐标应用的版本',
								    `user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
								    INDEX `idx_tmp_st_active_user_retain_ds_all_store` (`statis_date`,`hour`,`channel_id`,`app_plat_id`,`app_version_id`)
								) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
insert_ds_tmpuser_yyyymmdd:
INSERT INTO bi_tmp.tmp_st_active_user_retain_ds_all_store (
								    `statis_date`,
								    `hour`,
								    `channel_id`,
								    `app_plat_id`,
								    `app_version_id`,
								    `user_id`
								) SELECT
									`statis_date`,
									`hour`,
									- 1 AS channel_id,
									`app_plat_id`,
									`app_version_id`,
									`user_id`
								FROM
									bi_dw.dw_login_log_all_store
								WHERE
									1 = 1
								AND statis_date = ${store_id}
								GROUP BY
									`statis_date`,
									`hour`,
									`app_plat_id`,
									`app_version_id`,
									`user_id`
selectDsSql:
SELECT
									ifnull(`statis_date` ,- 1) AS statis_date,
									ifnull(`hour` ,- 1) AS hour,
									-1 as channel_id,
									ifnull(`app_plat_id` ,- 1) AS app_plat_id,
									ifnull(`app_version_id` ,- 1) AS app_version_id,
									count(DISTINCT `user_id`) AS active_user_count,
									0 AS	`second_days_retained`,
							        0 AS	`third_days_retained`,
								    0 AS	`fourth_days_retained`,
								    0 AS	`fifth_days_retained`,
								    0 AS	`sixth_days_retained`,
								    0 AS	`seventh_days_retained`,
								    0 AS	`fifteenth_days_retained`,
								    0 AS	`thirtieth_days_retained`
								FROM
									bi_dw.dw_login_log_all_store
								WHERE
									1 = 1
								AND `statis_date` = ${store_id}
create_ds_tmp_yyyymmdd:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bi_tmp.tmp_st_active_user_retain_ds_yyyymmdd (
								    `statis_date` int(9) NOT NULL,
								    `hour` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '小时为-1，则统计的为天，小时存在具体到天的小时统计',
								    `channel_id` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT 'AppStore、同步推、91助手 等，目前渠道为-1（未知）',
								    `app_plat_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '安卓，IOS，PC，Web',
								    `app_version_id` smallint(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '坐标应用的版本',
								    `active_user_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
								    `second_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
								    `third_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
								    `fourth_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
								    `fifth_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
								    `sixth_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
								    `seventh_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
								    `fifteenth_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
								    `thirtieth_days_retained` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
								    INDEX `idx_st_active_user_retain_ds_yyyymmdd` (`statis_date`,`hour`,`channel_id`,`app_plat_id`,`app_version_id`)
								) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
insert_ds_old_yyyymmdd:
INSERT INTO bi_tmp.tmp_st_active_user_retain_ds_yyyymmdd (
							        `statis_date`,
								    `hour`,
								    `channel_id`,
								    `app_plat_id`,
								    `app_version_id`,
								    `active_user_count`,
								    `second_days_retained`,
								    `third_days_retained`,
								    `fourth_days_retained`,
								    `fifth_days_retained`,
								    `sixth_days_retained`,
								    `seventh_days_retained`,
								    `fifteenth_days_retained`,
								    `thirtieth_days_retained`
						        )SELECT
									`statis_date`,
								    `hour`,
								    `channel_id`,
								    `app_plat_id`,
								    `app_version_id`,
								    `active_user_count`,
								    `second_days_retained`,
								    `third_days_retained`,
								    `fourth_days_retained`,
								    `fifth_days_retained`,
								    `sixth_days_retained`,
								    `seventh_days_retained`,
								    `fifteenth_days_retained`,
								    `thirtieth_days_retained`
								FROM
									bi_st.st_active_user_retain_dm_yyyymm
								WHERE
									1 = 1
								AND `statis_date`=  ${statis_date}
select_ds_new_yyyymmdd:
SELECT
									${statis_date} as statis_date,
									ifnull(`hour` ,- 1) AS hour,
									- 1 AS channel_id,
									ifnull(`app_plat_id` ,- 1) AS app_plat_id,
									ifnull(`app_version_id` ,- 1) AS app_version_id,
									0 AS active_user_count,
									${second_days_retained},
								    ${third_days_retained},
								    ${fourth_days_retained},
								    ${fifth_days_retained},
								    ${sixth_days_retained},
								    ${seventh_days_retained},
								    ${fifteenth_days_retained},
								    ${thirtieth_days_retained}
								FROM
									(
										SELECT
											s.statis_date,
											s.`hour`,
											s.app_plat_id,
											s.app_version_id,
											s.user_id
										FROM
											bi_tmp.tmp_st_active_user_retain_ds_all_store t
										LEFT JOIN bi_dw.dw_login_log_all_store s ON t.user_id = s.user_id
										WHERE
											1 = 1
										AND t.statis_date = ${retains_day}
										AND s.statis_date = ${yesterday}
										GROUP BY
											s.statis_date,
											s.`hour`,
											s.app_plat_id,
											s.app_version_id,
											s.user_id
									) a
insertDmSelectSql:
INSERT INTO bi_st.st_active_user_retain_dm_yyyymm (
									`statis_date`,
								    `hour`,
								    `channel_id`,
								    `app_plat_id`,
								    `app_version_id`,
								    `active_user_count`,
								    `second_days_retained`,
								    `third_days_retained`,
								    `fourth_days_retained`,
								    `fifth_days_retained`,
								    `sixth_days_retained`,
								    `seventh_days_retained`,
								    `fifteenth_days_retained`,
								    `thirtieth_days_retained`
								) SELECT
									`statis_date`,
									`hour`,
									`channel_id`,
									`app_plat_id`,
									`app_version_id`,
									sum(`active_user_count`) AS 'active_user_count',
									sum(`second_days_retained`) AS second_days_retained,
									sum(`third_days_retained`) AS third_days_retained,
									sum(`fourth_days_retained`) AS fourth_days_retained,
									sum(`fifth_days_retained`) AS fifth_days_retained,
									sum(`sixth_days_retained`) AS sixth_days_retained,
									sum(`seventh_days_retained`) AS seventh_days_retained,
									sum(`fifteenth_days_retained`) AS fifteenth_days_retained,
									sum(`thirtieth_days_retained`) AS thirtieth_days_retained
								FROM
									bi_tmp.tmp_st_active_user_retain_ds_yyyymmdd
								WHERE
									1 = 1
								GROUP BY
									`statis_date`,
								    `hour`,
								    `channel_id`,
								    `app_plat_id`,
								    `app_version_id`
delete_yes_date: delete from bi_st.st_active_user_retain_dm_yyyymm where 1=1 AND statis_date = ${statisDate}
